::: Megatron glanced around the bridge of the Iron Fist and had to admit it 
was impressive, but far to "showy". He saw the endless amounts of drones 
stamering about without a clue to live other than what the were told. :::

::: He took aseat and turned to a drone, ::: Get me and my commrads a drink, 
now.

::: The drone did as it was told and brought some Cybertronian drink that 
Megatron had not tasted in a long while. :::

::: Megatron then turned to Dark Mouse and Quickstrike ::: Whoever this 
Panzertron is, he certianly knows how to keep guests waiting.

~~~~~~~~

::: Rat Trap made a run for the Ark, but caught a hit from Shredder in the 
back of hs leg. he fell to the ground with a hole in his thigh. He began to 
scurry as fast as he could, and with fire al around him from Shredder, he 
made it into what was left of the Ark and hit a door mechanism. With that, 
the dor slid down and Rat Trap was safe for the moment. :::
